examples: he counted the ticks of the clock

definitions.text: any of two families of small parasitic arachnids with barbed proboscis; feed on blood of warm-blooded animals
a mark indicating that something has been noted or completed etc.
examples: as he called the role he put a check mark by each student's name

definitions.text: make a clicking or ticking sound
make a sound like a clock or a timer
put a check mark on or near or next to
examples: Please check each name on the list
